Package triviaMaze.room

Class LinkedRoom

java.lang.Object
triviaMaze.room.IRoom
triviaMaze.room.LinkedRoom
public class LinkedRoom
extends IRoom
An IRoom implementation that has four directional IRoomLinks which store the state of those links and form a maze structure when interconnected
Author:
Jacob Erdman
